messages.title: Strong Leadership.
messages.content:
A Clear Economic Plan.
A Better, More Secure Future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription:
Eliminate the deficit
Bring down our debt
Competitive business taxes to create more jobs

All pupils studying the core subjects at GCSE
Creating more excellent school places
Raising the status of the teaching profession

Keep job taxes down
All young people working or training - earning or learning
3 million new apprenticeships

Raise personal allowance to £12,500
Delivering tax-free childcare over £50,000

Reduce the benefit cap to £23,000 a year
Benefits frozen for 2 years
The toughest system on welfare for EU migrants anywhere in Europe

Pass on your pension tax-free
Protecting the triple lock
Integrating health and social care to improve care in retirement

leaflet.additionalNotes: NHS Services receive more investment for Morecambe and Lunesdale.
